item.title: Hotel-X: Supplier, Access, Client and Context
item.description:
Previously, we introduced an overarching definition of the main Core Entities applying to all Travelgate-X APIs. core concepts that apply to all TravelgateX APIs. Here, we want to dig in further on how those concepts are applied to Hotel-X API. Supplier A party that supplies accommodation services through a Supplier API implementation. Each Supplier has a Supplier code. These are unique values and they are used consistently throughout all TravelgateX implementations.
[...]

item.title: Hotel-X: Single Mode & Multi Mode
item.description:
Search Multi Mode is one of the main features of Hotel-X, even if you can use Search Multi Mode in Hotel-X Search Single Mode This mode is used when the client only wants to get options from a single access, for this, the client must indicate in the request the code of the access that they want to use. In the request have to use the access filter. { "filter": { "access": { "includes": ["yourAccess"] } } }
[...]
